item.title: Standard Course on Computational Geotechnics (6-9 May 2025) The Netherlands
item.description: Join the PLAXIS Standard course in The Netherlands May 6-9 2025

item.title: New release: PLAXIS 2024.2
item.description: This latest PLAXIS release includes two new user defined materials models to enhance tailings dams and design of tunnels in swelling rocks

item.title: PLAXIS 30 years: pave the way for a promising future
item.description: 30 years of innovation at PLAXIS drove the geotechnical analysis industry.
